name: Flame Strike
text: A flame strike evokes a vertical column of divine fire. The spell deals 1d6 points of damage per caster level (maximum 15d6). Half the damage is fire damage, but the other half results directly from divine power and is therefore not subject to being reduced by resistance to fire-based attacks.
mythicText: The damage dealt increases to 1d8 per caster level (maximum 15d8). The area increases to a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder. You may have the divine half of the damage affect only one specific creature type (as the bane weapon quality).
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 法器
text_zh: 焰击术会唤起一道垂直的圣火柱。法术造成每CL 1d6点伤害 (最高15d6)。这伤害一半是火焰伤害，但另一半是直接源自神力，因此抵抗火焰攻击的方式无法对这一部分起作用。
mythicText_zh: 法术造成的伤害增加至每施法者等级1d8点（最高15d8）。区域增加至‘半径20尺，40尺高的圆柱形’。你可以让来自神力的那一半伤害只影响特定的生物类型（如同破敌武器特性）。
